node.title: Jury selection begins in Lawrence Ray trial, accused of preying on students at Sarah Lawrence College
node.description: Ray is accused of physically and psychologically threatening college students​, extortion, and forcing a young woman into prostitution​.
node.content: ["NEW YORK - Jury selection is set to begin Wednesday in the Manhattan trial of a man accused of preying on his daughter's classmates at Sarah Lawrence College.\u00a0", "Lawrence Ray is accused of physically and psychologically threatening college students, extortion, and forcing a young woman into prostitution.\u00a0", "Prosecutors say Ray moved into his daughter's on-campus residence in 2010, where allegedly groomed his victims.\u00a0", "Ray denied the charges, which include racketeering, sex trafficking, and conspiracy.\u00a0", "If convicted, he could spend the rest of his life in prison.", "The CBSNewYork team is a group of experienced journalists who bring you the content on CBSNewYork.com."]
